headline.main: HOD CARRIERS FAIL TO BAR RACKETEERS; Convention Condemns in Gen- eral Terms, But Refuses to Vote Ban on Office Holders  SAND HOG' TRIAL ORDERED Charges Against New York Lo- cal 147 Referred to Executive Committee for Hearings

lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS, Sept. 19 -- The International Hod Carriers, Building and Common Laborers Union of America adopted a resolution today condemning racketeers, but the convention refused to go on record as barring from office those found guilty of racketeering, embezzlement or larceny of funds.
abstract: resolutions; condemns racketeers but refuses to bar them from office; charges of const irregularities against Local 147 referred to exec com
